May 2025: “Bark at the Moon” by Ozzy Osbourne

  • The challenge: Jake E. Lee’s magnificent octopus, “Bark at the Moon”, has been required reading for metal guitarists for around forty years. The Brothers must try to get the whole thing down in one go.
